name: Honey Rush (portable_bird)
description:
Rush around a slippery hive to collect honey before it hardens into honey comb walls. You can drop honey combs yourself, but be careful not to trap yourself or use all of your energy. The floor of the hive is slippery and you can't change directions until you hit something!

Keep your energy up to keep playing, and try to get as many drops of honey as you can. 

Controls:

Left/Right/Up/DownMoveXDrop honey comb

Game made in Pico8 in 4 hours for the crunchyJam.
